H0.text: Who composed the 1884 'Holberg Suite'. Johannes Brahms

H1.text: Who composed the 1884 'Holberg Suite'. Antonín Dvořák

H2.text: Who composed the 1884 'Holberg Suite'. Pyotr Ilyich Tchaikovsky

H3.text: Who composed the 1884 'Holberg Suite'. EDVARD GREEG

A4.text: Grieg's Holberg Suite was originally written for the piano, and later arranged by the composer for string orchestra.

A5.text: The Holberg Suite, Op. 40, more properly From Holberg's Time, is a suite of five movements based on eighteenth-century dance forms, written by Edvard Grieg in 1884
